key.name: show-applications
key.description: If true, show applications item in menu bar.

key.name: show-places
key.description: If true, show places item in menu bar.

key.name: show-desktop
key.description: If true, show desktop item in menu bar.

key.name: show-icon
key.description: If true, show icon in menu bar.

key.name: icon-name
key.summary: Icon to show in menu bar
key.description: Set the theme icon name to use in menu bar.
